scripts.dev: set APP_ENV=development&& set NODE_MODE=development&& node app.js
scripts.build:development: set APP_ENV=development&& set NODE_MODE=production&& next build
scripts.build:staging: set APP_ENV=staging&& set NODE_MODE=production&& next build
scripts.build:production: set APP_ENV=production&& set NODE_MODE=production&& next build
scripts.dev:start: set APP_ENV=development&& set NODE_MODE=production&& node app.js
scripts.stag:start: set APP_ENV=staging&& set NODE_MODE=production&& node app.js
scripts.prod:start: set APP_ENV=production&& set NODE_MODE=production&& node app.js
